FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In southeast, southwesterly 5 to 7, increasing 7 to severe gale 9, veering westerly or northwesterly 5 or 6 later. In northwest, cyclonic, becoming westerly later, 4 to 6, increasing 7 at times.
Sea state
In southeast, rough or very rough. in northwest, rough or very rough, occasionally high later.
Weather
In southeast, occasional rain. In northwest, rain then showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
